11 
12 #include <stdint.h>
13 #include <sys/reent.h>
14 
15 #include "mcu/types.h"
16 
17 
18 #define SCOPE_PROCESS 0
19 #define SCOPE_THREAD 1
20 
21 void signal_handler(int tid, int si_signo, int si_sigcode_si_tid, union sigval sig_value);
22 int signal_send(int tid, int si_signo, int si_sigcode, int sig_value);
23 int signal_priv_send(int send_tid,
24  int tid,
25  int si_signo,
26  int si_sigcode,
27  int sig_value,
28  int forward //this must be non-zero unless si_signo == SIGKILL
29  ) MCU_WEAK MCU_PRIV_CODE;
30 void signal_priv_activate(int * thread) MCU_PRIV_EXEC_CODE;
31 void signal_priv_wait(void * args) MCU_PRIV_EXEC_CODE;
32 
33 
34 //this is set if the signal received executes a user defined function
35 #define _PROC_FLAG_SIGEXEC 2
36 
37 #define SIGCAUGHT_ASSERTED() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags & (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCAUGHT))
38 #define SIGCAUGHT_ASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags |= (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCAUGHT))
39 #define SIGCAUGHT_DEASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags &= ~(1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCAUGHT))
40 
41 #define SIGCHLD_ASSERTED() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags & (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
42 #define SIGCHLD_ASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags |= (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
43 #define SIGCHLD_DEASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags &= ~(1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
44 
45 #define SIGEXEC_ASSERTED() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags & (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
46 #define SIGEXEC_ASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags |= (1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
47 #define SIGEXEC_DEASSERT() (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->flags &= ~(1<<_PROC_FLAG_SIGCHLD))
48 
49 #define THREAD_SIGMASK (_REENT->sigmask)
50 #define THREAD_SIGPENDING (_REENT->sigpending)
51 #define GLOBAL_SIGINFOS (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->siginfos)
52 #define GLOBAL_SIGINFO(signo) (((siginfo_t*)(_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->siginfos))[signo])
53 #define GLOBAL_SIGACTIONS (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->sigactions)
54 #define GLOBAL_SIGACTION(signo) (_GLOBAL_REENT->procmem_base->sigactions[signo])
55 
56 #endif /* SIG_LOCAL_H_ */
